recipesJson.name: Zeppole ala Creme
recipesJson.author: heatho72
recipesJson.description:
Nice and simple cream filled doughnut. I did not use sweetener since zeppola is pretty sweet on its own but please sweeten to taste. It is a doughnut after all.ðŸ˜‚
7 day steep.
Enjoy

reviews.text: Very good recipe. It's exactly what it says it is. A nice creamy doughnut! Great recipe as always heatho! I would have rated it when I first mixed it, but I just got a subscription.
Definitely one of the better vanilla cream donut recipes out there, and definitely worth a second mix.
Wonderful recipe, so tasty. Thanks for sharing! Already made 240ml and it's definitely in my rotation now.
